component.name: SimpleDialog
component.script:
function init() print "Creating ScrollingContentAreaDialog"
m.buttonarea = m.top.findNode("buttonArea") m.title = m.top.findNode("title") m.okayButton = m.top.findNode("okayButton") m.cancelButton = m.top.findNode("cancelButton") m.text = m.top.findNode("text") m.buttons = m.top.findNode("buttons")
m.top.observeFieldScoped("buttonFocused", "printFocusButton") m.top.observeFieldScoped("buttonSelected", "printSelectedButtonAndClose") m.top.observeFieldScoped("wasClosed", "wasClosedChanged")
if m.top.showCancel = false m.cancelButton.visible = false end if end function
sub setTitle(obj) m.title.primaryTitle = obj.getData() end sub
sub setText(obj) m.text.text = obj.getData() end sub
sub updateButtons(obj) buttons = obj.getData() if (m.buttonarea <> Invalid AND m.buttonarea.getChildCount() > 0) childNodes = m.buttonarea.getChildren(-1, 0) m.buttonarea.removeChildren(childNodes) end if
if (buttons <> Invalid AND buttons.count() > 0) for each button in buttons buttonNode = createObject("roSGNode", "StdDlgButton") buttonNode.text = button m.buttonarea.appendChild(buttonNode) end for m.buttonarea.getChild(0).setFocus(true) end if end sub
sub printFocusButton() print "m.buttonarea button ";m.buttonarea.getChild(m.top.buttonFocused).text;" focused" end sub
sub printSelectedButtonAndClose() print "m.buttonarea button ";m.buttonarea.getChild(m.top.buttonSelected).text;" selected" m.top.close = true end sub
sub wasClosedChanged() print "ScrollingContentAreaDialog Closed" end sub
